title: (x) Image Source logo - AutoScape {Yves}
content:
I'm looking for this font... (more on http://www.imagesource.com).  
Don't if it's custom or not but anything similar would do fine ? Thank you, Marco  
 [img:is-logo\_5377.gif]
author: Marco

comments.content:
Shift Post Mono by Joshua Distler might do the job.

[img:postmono\_3969.png]

Yves, I like the code you are using to name the solved ID thread, very smart.  
Keep up the good work.

The syntax was actually created by Stephen when he started to tag and credit positive identifications. When I started helping him out and subsequently took over I inherited the system. Indeed it works very well. :^)
